visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a column chart with the title 'Highcharts responsive chart'. The chart should have a subtitle that says 'Resize the frame to see subtitle and legend hide'. The x-axis should have categories 'Apples', 'Oranges', and 'Bananas'. The y-axis should have the title 'Amount'. The data series should be named 'Fruits' with data points [1, 4, 3]. The chart should be responsive, hiding the subtitle and legend when the width is 500px or less. Additionally, provide buttons to resize the chart to 400x300 and 600x300 dimensions.

subtitle.text: Resize the frame to see subtitle and legend hide

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with a title 'Highcharts responsive chart' and a subtitle that instructs users to resize the frame to see the subtitle and legend hide. The x-axis is labeled with categories 'Apples', 'Oranges', and 'Bananas', while the y-axis is titled 'Amount'. The data series is named 'Fruits' and contains the data points [1, 4, 3]. The chart is made responsive by hiding the subtitle and legend when the chart width is 500px or less. This is achieved by adding a class 'small-chart' to the chart when the condition is met. Additionally, the HTML and JavaScript code includes buttons that allow users to resize the chart to specific dimensions (400x300 and 600x300), enhancing the interactivity of the chart.
